sub_text: We offer classes to children aged 4 to 6 and adult beginners in a fun, safe, and inclusive environment.
meta_desc: Jiu-Jitsu Saint-Lambert is a Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu club located in Saint-Lambert, Québec.
bio: <1>Tetsuro started training Brazilian jiu-jitsu in 2016 and has been hooked ever since. His goal is to share his love of the sport to kids and adults in the neighbourhood.</1> <1>Tetsuro received his purple belt from Val Astraverkhau at <2>Mizu Studio</2> in 2022 and continues to learn and train regularly.</1>
location_desc: Classes take place in the lower hall of the Christian Education Centre, located at 485 av. Birch.
